titleStmt.title: List of persons and money owed
titleStmt.author: Unknown

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: List of the money owed, Euhemeria;Chairemon, son of Ptolion: 60 drachmai kai interest 34 drachmai;Nepheras, son of Teos: [.] drachmai;Petsiris and his brother: [.] drachmai;Sisois, craftsman, 1/2 artaba of wheat, 16 drachmai kai 1/2 artaba of barley 30 drachmai and ... 12 drachmai, interest 4 drachmai, total 16 drachmai, other 26 dtachmai;Pansneus, craftsman, 1/2 artaba of wheat 14 drachmai 1 obol and interest;Psenatymis, builder, 1/2 artaba of wheat, 14 drachmai and 2 drachmai and interest;Chares, son of Arion, 1 artaba of wheat 24 drachmai, other 12 drachmai, total 36 drachmai;kai interest. Horion and other, 8 drachmai, [.] artabai of wheat, 1 1/2 artaba of barley 36 drachmai, interest 12 drachmai;Kephalas, son of Sisois from [...] 8 drachmai, other [.] drachmai ...;4 drachmai. Leon son of A...d[ ] 1 artaba of barley 24 drachmai;Satabous.... 36 drachmai;Hermion [ ] 100 drachmai ...

listBibl.bibl: Grenfell BP-Hunt AS-Hogarth DG, PFay, 247, 1900 Sijpesteijn PJ, Aegyptus 67, 76-78, 1987 -- SB XVIII 13145
